summary: This is an email introducing a new member to the IIG team, who previously worked in the Public Corruption unit and prosecuted Jeffrey Epstein. It highlights the professional transition of a prosecutor from the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the subject of 'boring cases' prosecuted by a former Public Corruption unit attorney who is now joining the IIG team.

keyFacts: A former prosecutor from the Public Corruption unit, who worked on the Jeffrey Epstein case, is joining the IIG team.
The email is dated August 12, 2020, indicating ongoing personnel movements related to the Epstein case years after his death.
The correspondence originates from the Southern District of New York, a key jurisdiction in the Epstein investigations.
